menu_rifleman_beta_desc: BASIC: ##$basic;##$NL;Your snap to zoom is ##$multibasic;## faster with all weapons.$NL;$NL;Your movement speed is unhindered while using steel sight.$NL;$NL;ACE: ##$pro;##$NL;If you shoot at an enemy from ##18m## away, bonus damage exponential to the distance will be applied. It can only be triggered by sniper rifles and functions as simple damage.
